update T_HYPERTENSION_VISITS
HR_GID = #{hrGid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TRA_EXE_DURATION = #{traExeDuration,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

TRA_INGO_SALT = #{traIngoSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSY_ADJ_EVA = #{psyAdjEva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_BEH_EVA = #{comBehEva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MED_COM = #{medCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADV_DRUG_REA = #{advDrugRea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADV_DRUG_REA_DES = #{advDrugReaDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISITS_EVA = #{visitsEva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DRUG_FREQ = #{drugFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where HYPE_GID = #{hypeGid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
